updated_cases.title: Validate custom block notification with browser based notification with IPS enabled for malware traffic with Upload activity
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate custom default block notification with browser based notification with IPS enabled for malware traffic
updated_cases.custom_preconds: stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Enable IPS. 
2. Use custom template having different variables like URL, category, etc.
3. Change usernotification setting to use browser.
4. Login to Box app.
5. Upload malware file.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Make sure custom block template is displayed within browser
2. Uploading file is blocked.

updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Verify UserJustification template with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN and Activity in message and subtitle field

Change usernotification setting to client.

Create user alert policy for upload for Box application.

Perform Upload to Box application.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure Application, Category and FQDN are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in client notification.

Make sure variable values are matching same as transaction events.

Make sure templates are created with version 2.1 on nsproxy.

File should get uploaded after clicking on Proceed action

updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Verify UserJustification template with existing variables with new name: Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name

Create user alert policy for upload for Box application.

Perform Upload to Box application.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in client notification.

Make sure variable values are matching with the values in transaction events.

Access any social website
